metadata.name: Aesthetic Madness #1/80
metadata.description:
When you have no hope, when common sense doesn't work.  
When you don't have enough oxygen and your mind goes dark.  
When every part of you trembles in fear and you can't move.

Will you give me your heart so I can save you?


My name is Aizen and I released the first part of my Open Edition called "Fury", This is the world I envision.

Every holder will become one with "Fury".

I appreciate your support and as a way of gratitude, ten lucky holders will get airdropped for my next open edition.
